hints.title: Emergent Lorentzian Metric
hints.content:
12: :label: rem-lorentzian-structure-stress-energy
13: 
14: The stress-energy tensor construction in {prf:ref}`def-stress-energy-discrete` and {prf:ref}`def-stress-energy-continuum` relies on the **emergent Lorentzian metric** established in [13_fractal_set_new/11_causal_sets.md](13_fractal_set_new/11_causal_sets.md).
15: 
16: From {prf:ref}`rem-lorentzian-from-riemannian`, the emergent Riemannian metric $g_{ij}(x) = H_{ij}(x) + \varepsilon \delta_{ij}$ on the spatial slice $\mathcal{X}$ is promoted to a Lorentzian metric on spacetime $M = \mathbb{R} \times \mathcal{X}$:
17: 
18: $$
19: ds^2 = -c^2 dt^2 + g_{ij}(x) dx^i dx^j
20: $$
21: 
22: where $c = \ell_{\text{typ}}/\Delta t$ is the effective "speed of light" set by the algorithm's spatial/temporal scales.
23: 
24: **Four-velocity**: For a walker with spatial velocity $v^i(t)$, the proper four-velocity is:
25: 
26: $$
27: u^\mu = \gamma_v (c, v^i)
28: $$
29: 
30: where $\gamma_v = 1/\sqrt{1 - \|v\|^2/c^2}$ is the Lorentz factor.
31: 
32: **Four-momentum**: The proper four-momentum is:
33: 
34: $$
35: p^\mu = m u^\mu = m \gamma_v (c, v^i)
36: $$
37: 
38: where $m$ is the walker "mass" (set to 1 in our units).
39: 
40: **Energy-momentum relation**:
41: 
42: $$
43: p_\mu p^\mu = g_{\mu\nu} p^\mu p^\nu = -m^2 c^2
44: $$
45: 
46: This reduces to:
47: 
48: $$
49: -\gamma_v^2 c^2 + g_{ij} \gamma_v^2 v^i v^j = -c^2 + \gamma_v^2 (\|v\|^2 - c^2) = -c^2
50: $$
